Structure# CAShapeLayerLineJoin

iOS 3.0+iPadOS 3.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.6+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
struct CAShapeLayerLineJoin
```

[`init(rawValue: String)`](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinejoin/init(rawvalue:))### [Type Properties](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinejoin#Type-Properties)

[`static let bevel: CAShapeLayerLineJoin`](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinejoin/bevel)Specifies a bevel line shape of the joints between connected segments of a stroked path.[`static let miter: CAShapeLayerLineJoin`](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinejoin/miter)Specifies a miter line shape of the joints between connected segments of a stroked path.[`static let round: CAShapeLayerLineJoin`](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinejoin/round)Specifies a round line shape of the joints between connected segments of a stroked path.## [Relationships](/documentation/quartzcore/cashapelayerlinejoin#relationships)
